text: sorry to hijack, I just saw the code and in line <https://github.com/baggepinnen/SingularSpectrumAnalysis.jl/blob/35c55edb7f140d19224fefa7dee57ba8a24e464e/src/SingularSpectrumAnalysis.jl#L191> seems like you have a leakage into global scope searching for `i` which is not defined in the left hand side. Just letting you know in case you missed a typo
